title: Define System Architecture
description: Create high-level architecture for the Global Consistent Hashing System, including node distribution, data partitioning strategy, and load balancing mechanisms.

title: Design Consistent Hashing Algorithm
description: Design a consistent hashing algorithm that ensures efficient data partitioning and load balancing across the global network of nodes.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly frontend interface for managing nodes, monitoring load balancing, and visualizing system metrics.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services responsible for data partitioning, load balancing, and communication between nodes.

title: Configure Database Schema
description: Create and configure the necessary database schema for storing node information, data partitions, and system metrics.

title: Set Up DevOps Infrastructure
description: Configure the Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline, automate testing, and set up monitoring tools.

title: Perform Unit Tests
description: Write and execute unit tests for each component of the system to ensure functionality and scalability.

title: Document System Design
description: Create comprehensive documentation detailing the system design, components, and usage.

title: Review System Design RFC
description: Review and provide feedback on the system design RFC to ensure alignment with project goals and technical feasibility.
